text: Nivel 3 is the third album released by Mexican rock band, Coda. It was released in 1997. ==Track listing== # "No Digas No" - 3:20 # "Luz Roja" - 3:42 # "Por Tí" - 3:47 # "Prohibido" - 4:09 # "En La Marea Del Pecado" - 4:18 # "Perdóname" - 4:23 # "Carrusel" - 3:34 # "Muy Bien" - 4:10 # "No Te Quiero Perder" - 5:00 # "Halcón De Invierno" - 4:54 # "¿Que Color Se Necesita?" - 5:27 ==Personnel== * Salvador Aguilar - lead vocals * Toño Ruiz - guitars * Chucho Esquivel - drums * Allan Pérez - bass * David Melchor - keyboards ==Notes== ==References== *Album Info at Heavy Harmonies. Category:1997 albums Category:Coda (band) albums
title: Nivel 3
